Keywords: Batman Family , Detective , Gotham City , Justice League , Kryptonian , Metropolis , Reporter , Trinity
Real Name: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent
Special Powers
GO! I CAN TAKE IT FROM HERE: When World's Finest is KO'd by an attack, before removing them from the game, you may generate a character named Batman and/or a character named Superman from your Sideline on their last non-KO clicks, then heal them each 2 clicks. The total points of the generated characters must be equal to or less than World's Finest's point value. If World's Finest is 60 points, only generate one of the two characters instead. Protected: Pulse Wave.
THE DARK KNIGHT AND THE BIG BLUE BOY SCOUT: FREE: Make an attack but only to target an opposing character that, since your last turn, made an attack or used Outwit.
THINK LONG AND HARD BEFORE YOU DO SOMETHING YOU MIGHT REGRET: When World's Finest would take damage from the effect of an opposing character of equal or less points than them, roll a d6. 4-6: World's Finest takes a maximum of 1 damage from that effect.
LOOKS LIKE WE GOT TROUBLE: Combat Reflexes, Invincible. Super Senses, but increase the result by +1 for each action token on World's Finest. Protected: Outwit.
